text: jab hamane tumase kaha, "tumhaare rab ne logon ko apane ghere mein le rakha hai aur jo alaukik darshan hamane tumhen karaaya use to hamane logon ke lie keval ek aazamaish bana diya aur us vrksh ko bhee jise quraan mein tiraskrt thaharaaya gaya hai. ham unhen daraate hai, kintu yah cheez unakee badhee huee sarakashee hee ko badha rahee hai.
